description: Made from 13.6 oz black denim. Early 1950s-inspired details. Reinforced with double-needle stitching at the seams. Fitted through the chest and waist. Sanforized® to minimize shrinkage.
fitting_details: Fitted through the chest and waist.
Size medium has a 25" front body length, a 24" back body length, an 18¾" shoulder, a 42½" chest, and a 34¾" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Adjustable tabs at the back waist.
Due to the natural characteristics of this material, the coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
